title: RBI Floating Rate Savings Bond interest rate announced for January to June 2025; check latest details and other features
description:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced the latest interest rate for RBI Floating Rate Savings Bonds on Wednesday for January to June 2025.

The RBI Floating Rate Savings Bond, 2020 (Taxable) will be offered at 8.05 per cent interest rates from January to June 2025. The interest rate of the RB...
